elements.text:
menuitem creates an item in the hamburger menu 
between the 'about' button and the 'Close window' button.

menuitem{
  id = 3,
  label = "Foo",
  shortcut = "CTRL-O",
  greyed = false,
  action = function(b) end
}

id : used to identify menu items. Does not currently affect menu item order.
label : The label on the menu item.
shortcut : the shortcut to press this option. Drawn right justified in the menu.
action : the function to call when the menu item is pressed
